attributes.title: Horrible and has no morals
attributes.review: What kind of app is this???????? My poor grandma is now brainwashed and won’t snap out of it!!!! She is now a racist, homophobic, transphobic, misogynist with a dash of pedophilia. How could they promote such ideas to such moldeable minds?? Disgraceful. Would give zero stars if possible.

attributes.title: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS APP
attributes.review:
I was opening the app and then all of a sudden this story appears: 
“ Once upon a time, on a peaceful day little red riding hood👩🏻‍🦰was relaxing in her small cottage🏠while her mother👩🏻‍🦱was baking a apple pie🍎🥧. After her mother 👩🏻‍🦱was done baking the pie 🥧she yelled “Sweetheart can you please take this pie to your grandmother’s👵🏼🏠 house”.
“Of course mother I would love to see grandma👵🏼 anyway” 👩🏻‍🦰little red riding hood said. Her mother👩🏻‍🦱 put the pie 🥧in a little brown basket 🧺and gave it to her. After she gave her the basket🧺 little red riding hood 👩🏻‍🦰was on her way to her dear grandmother’s 👵🏼🏠house. Before red riding hood 👩🏻‍🦰was about to go on the path to her grandmother’s house 👵🏼🏠the mom 👩🏻‍🦱yelled out to her “ Honey please be careful 👁👄👁while you are in the forest it would be a shame if you got hurt🤕😵”. “Ok mother😄 don’t worry i will be fine😉” little red riding👩🏻‍🦰 said. So 5 minutes past little red riding 👩🏻‍🦰🎤was humming and skipping 💃💃minding her business😌 when suddenly she heard a noise😮 from a bush 🌳she stopped her skipping 😲and was curious 🤔of the noise in the bush🌳the bush was moving. Little red 👩🏻‍🦰was confused she thought it was probably a little woodland 🐇🐿🦝creature so she decided to start skipping 💃again, but before she could even take 🚶‍♀️a step a big wolf 🐺🤾‍♀️jumped out from the bush🌳. “AHHHH”!!! 😣😫little red 👩🏻‍🦰shouted from being startled. The wolf 🐺looked mean😡 and scary😈 but this didn’t look like a ordinary👻 wolf he stood up 🦵🦵and started talking  🐺“ hello little girl i noticed a delightful smell😌 coming from your basket 🧺may i ask what that is”? the wolf asked. “Oh well hello mr.wolf this is a apple pie🍎🥧 for my grandmother👵🏼” she explained. “Oh a apple pie 🍎🥧you say you wouldn’t mind if i had a slice right i’m very hungry🤪😋” the wolf said with a smirk 😏on his face. “I’m deeply sorry😕 mr.wolf but this for my grandmother” she said.  “Oh that’s too bad 😢😭😖i guess i’ll have to eat you 😺😈then” the wolf said as he tried to jumped😈🤾‍♀️ on her, but red riding hood 👩🏻‍🦰😰😨quickly dodged the wolf and ran away🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️ as fast as she could. She kept running 🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️and running until she lost sight😗 of the wolf she didn’t see the wolf chase her but she was glad she lost sight 😖🙂🙃of him. “That was a close one 😰😓i need to hurry so i can go back home😔” she said. A few minutes later👩🏻‍🦰 she finally arrived at her grandmother’s house👵🏼🏠 when she was approaching🚶‍♀️ in front of the house🏠 she saw that the front door was open😨 so she quickly ran inside🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️. When she came inside she saw that the ⛓💣🧨💣⛓⚒🔨🔧🛠🏚house was ruined inside vase broken😓, chair on the floor😨, pictures knocked down😐, and even the couch had a scratch mark across it.😲”GRANDMOTHER GRANDMOTHER WHERE ARE YOU”!!! she yelled in fear🤭😱😭. “I’m in here dear😌” the grandmother👵🏼 said. Red riding hood👩🏻‍🦰🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️ quickly ran into the bedroom and in the bed she saw her grandmother👵🏼🙂. “Oh grandmother 👵🏼thank god 🙂you are ok what on earth happened in the living room and the front door was opened”. she asked confused🤔. “Oh umm 🤨😐umm it was a umm a RACCOON🦝 yes a raccoon🦝 came in and was looking for food 🍓🥭🌶🍗🌭🌮🌭🥔so i was chasing👵🏼🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🧹🦝 it around the house i finally let it out and i must have forgot to close the door 🚪anyway i’m fine darling🤗” the grandmother explained. “Oh 😐is that so well as long you are ok 😇and granny your voice seems a bit different😑 are you ok”? she asked. “Just a little cold 👵🏼🥶i have nothing to worry about🤪” the grandmother said. “and granny what big hands🤲👵🏼you have” as she holded them👩🏻‍🦰🤲. “The better to give you a nice warm hug 🤗 my dear” the grandmother said. “what big 👀👁👄👁eyes you have as well granny” as red riding hood👩🏻‍🦰😐 was getting confused. “The better to see how beautiful👀🥰 you are  of course darling” the grandmother said smiling. “Oh my what big teeth🤠🦷🦷🦷🦷 you have too” red riding hood said startled👩🏻‍🦰😧. “THE BETTER TO EAT YOU WITH MY DEAR😈😈😈😈😋😋”!!! with that red riding hood got swallowed 🙀🙀🙀🙀whole by the grandmother👵🏼 which was the wolf🐺😳. Red riding hood fell straight⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️ down in the wolf’s stomach while screaming🙀🙀😣😫. She landed on his gooey insides🥩🥩🥩🥩🥩. “My dear is that you😟🙂”? She heard 😲a familiar voice when she looked it was her grandmother👵🏼✨. “Oh my god grandmother” she ran in for a hug🤗. “That stupid 😡wolf🐺 attacked 🛠🧨🔪⚙️💣me and ate me 😋😈we have to get out of here😩😠” the grandmother explained. “Yes🧐 we do luckily 😁i have a knife🔪🧺 in the basket let’s just cut our way out🙂” red riding hood 👩🏻‍🦰explained. “Oh yes good idea👵🏼☺️”! the grandmother with excitement😆. So red riding hood 👩🏻‍🦰and her grandmother 👵🏼cut opened the wolf’s 🐺🥩🥩🥩🥩stomach and escaped😎. After they cleaned up ✨✨✨✨✨the mess the grandmother👵🏼 made a new coat🧥 for her granddaughter👩🏻‍🦰 made out of the wolf’s🐺 fur. They also ate the wolf🐺😵😋 and lived happily ever after🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳✨✨✨✨✨✨.
THE END✨🧚🏼‍♀️
CAST:👩🏻‍🦰👵🏼🐺👩🏻‍🦱” 
I didn’t know what to do I was scared so I deleted the app. I enjoyed the story tho

attributes.title: this app sucks👎🏽👎🏽
attributes.review: this app took 2 days to download. ppl were saying that it takes so long bc it takes information from ur phone. which is true, i woke up the next day to see all of my social media platforms logged out of, new apps on my phone, and all of my emails deleted. then a day later i started to get scam phone and ads pop up on all my social media’s. SAVE YOURSELF THE TROUBLE AND DONT GET THIS APP!!!👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY POSITIVELY DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app immediately gives you 12 viruses and can have your phone hacked. It took 24 hours to download and almost takes all of your phones battery to operate. Donald Trump has the app rigged where you have to pay a $20.00 fee just for having this app. Good luck cuties 😈✨😌

attributes.title: THIS SUCKS🤬
attributes.review: IT TOOK 69 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD AND IT KEPT CRASHING ON ME, MY TIME ON MY PHONE WONT CHANGE OTS STUCK ON 4:20 PM GIVE ME A NEW PHONE NOW OR IM CALLING COURT
by far the W O R S T app I’ve ever downloaded🤢 all I saw was a cheeto on my screen, it’s confusing and i cannot support it... that’s all i got to say for now✌🏼🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: OH HELL NO!!!
attributes.review:
***TRIGGER WARNING***
I opened this app and it tried to rape me. 
I had to scream “IM 25” before they realized I was too old (ie. I’m not a 13 year old who’s too terrified to testify against him only have it follow her around to haunt her for the rest of her life) so he wouldn’t be able to pay me off. Thankfully I was able to think on my feet and get out of this situation but it was truly terrifying. 
1 Star.

attributes.title: Bruh
attributes.review: This app gave butt cancer and now I can’t see my little elf’s so I’m mad why would you take my elf’s away what did they do to you they were my pals and I can’t live without them
